CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 13;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage, costs and expenses - financial award (global)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP ORG of Lugansk ordered ORG Zavod ” to pay the applicant ORG CARDINAL in salary arrears and other payments .
CARDINAL . On DATE the GPE ORG instituted enforcement proceedings in respect of that judgment .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant lodged with the GPE ORG of Lugansk a complaint alleging the unlawfulness of ORG inactivity in respect of the enforcement of the judgment in his favour . On DATE the court found against the applicant , finding no fault on the part of the Bailiffs . The applicant did not appeal in cassation against that decision .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the same court against ORG seeking compensation for failure to enforce the judgment . On DATE the court rejected the applicant ’s claim as being unsubstantiated .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE , respectively , ORG and ORG upheld the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . In CARDINAL instalments of CARDINAL and DATE the amount of the judgment debt was transferred to the Bailiffs’ deposit account . On the same dates the applicant was invited to provide ORG with his bank account details in order that they transfer the amount of the award .
CARDINAL . The applicant informed ORG that he did not wish to take the money before the ORG decided on his application .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of Romashov v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
